title: Bravo's 100 Scariest Movie Moments & 30 Even Scarier Movie Mo
description:
Yes, this is the 5 part miniseries "The 100 Scariest Movie Moments" that originally aired in October of 2004 on Bravo TV. It is a countdown of the 100 most shocking, disturbing and downright scary movie moments ever made. Interviews include: Peter Jackson, Wes Craven, John Carpenter, Stephen King, Clive Barker, George A. Romero, Courtney Cox, Bruce Campbell, Tobe Hooper, Robert Englund, Eli Roth, Rob Zombie and many more. This is a great way to find out about films that you&#039;ve never heard of or relive the horrors of the ones you&#039;ve seen. 

Also included is the companion piece: "30 Even Scarier Movie Moments" that aired on Bravo TV in October of 2006. It features alot of the same interviewees from the first with a few new faces. 

For the official list: http://www.bravotv.com/The_100_Scariest_Movie_Moments/index.shtml

Files:
100 Scariest Movie Moments Part I (100-76)
100 Scariest Movie Moments Part II (75-51)
100 Scariest Movie Moments Part III (50-31)
100 Scariest Movie Moments Part IV (30-11)
100 Scariest Movie Moments Part V (10-1)
30 Even Scarier Movie Moments Part I (30-15)
30 Even Scarier Movie Moments Part II (15-1)

All files clock in at just under 45 minutes and are .avi files.

Enjoy and don&#039;t forget to seed!
